The app will select a word randomly. 
 The goal is to guess what the word is. 

 You can tell how many letters are in the word by the number of underlines shown. 

 If you guess a letter correctly, the corresponding underline(s) will be replaced by that letter. 

 Every time you guess a letter which is not in the word, you are one step closer to being hung. 


 Do not get hung.
